trans-unit.source: Represents an enumeration of the permissible actions which may be performed on an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />, which typically represents the collection of all child activities of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma enumeração das ações permitidas que podem ser executadas em um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />, que normalmente representa a coleção de todas as atividades filho de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator corresponding to adding a new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador correspondente à adição de uma nova <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator corresponding to removing an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador correspondente à remoção de uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator corresponding to replacing an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador correspondente à substituição de uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> na <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.
